title: aylabadia05
author: aylabadia05
content: Computers and laptops are one of the work devices that are needed to do work. Almost all work sectors use these two devices as media or tools to get the job done. Starting from making financial reports for offices, businesses, trading to other technical work. Therefore, computers and laptops have become daily necessities like basic needs.I realize that not all of us who are active in the crypto space have a Personal Computer or Laptop due to limited money to be able to get it.Even though as we all know that working with a Personal Computer and with a Laptop will get maximum results starting from creating posts and other activities as I have mentioned.Here, I want to say that without Personal Computers and Laptops we can also be active even easier and more flexible by using work tools such as mobile devices, namely Android, can even be more effective like using a PC or Laptop.With the sophistication of Android or other mobile devices, now their use is like a PC or Laptop. Especially around crypto activities.Simply by using one browser like google, you can do various activities in the crypto space such as trading and bitcointalk forum activities.If you are not a native English speaker like me, you can create a new tab on the google browser and use translation sites such as google translate or other translation sites that suit you by activating desktop mode for maximum results.Likewise, to carry out buying and selling activities, you can also open exchange sites such as Binance.com in the browser in almost the same way as the translation site above. It's just that in crypto trading activities such as Binance exchange, you need to install the mobile version of the application on your mobile device (for those who don't have an account yet).When it comes to wallets, I recommend using Blue Wallet instead of other mobile Bitcoin wallets.You can see and learn how in the link below.[Tutorial] BlueWallet - Bitcoin Wallet DiscussionLikewise, if you want to create images, there are many related applications available on the app store or playstore that we can install on our mobile devices.That is, there is nothing that can make it difficult for us if we are willing to continue to be active even though we have a financial shortage to be able to get a PC or Laptop. But if later our finances are sufficient to get devices such as PCs and Laptops, then working with these devices is much better.This post looks ordinary, but I hope it can provide benefits to everyone who is still constrained by time to activate themselves on the bitcointalk forum.Hopefully it will be useful for all of you.For me, even the smallest amount of information that can be useful to others is a joy in living life.Don't complain. Everything can be active if we want to be active.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Been using android mobile since first day of registration here, it has been doing full justice to forum and every crypto related activities.WIth browsers like kiwi, you can use almost all extensions smoothly.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Being on the forum and active does not really determines the type of device used to log in but as i could best understand what lies in here is that it will get to a particular point in time whereby you will also need the function of either mobile phones, laptop or a setup computer system for one operation or the other, you will need a laptop incase of installing softwares, cold storage wallets, and running of other apps that are loadable directly from the computer while mobile phone will also be required in places you have no access to electricity, movable device, and emergencies that you have to move without the use of the computer in specific locations, but your movable mobiles can grant you access to your assets on the blockchain and you can be always active on the forum using the phone.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: First of all there is no mobile version of website available for bitcointalk so even if you open bitcointalk.org with any mobile device you will see the same website as desktop version.So everything is possible with mobile devices as well but for the convenience of writing the big keyboard of PC or laptop can't equalize the keyboard of Android especially one with fat fingers like me.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: aylabadia05 on December 23, 2022, 11:15:43 AMHere, I want to say that without Personal Computers and Laptops we can also be active even easier and more flexible by using work tools such as mobile devices, namely Android, can even be more effective like using a PC or Laptop.This is highly exaggerated and erroneous . No mobile device can replace all the conveniences of using a normal laptop or computer.Another thing is that you want to encourage users not to turn away from the forum, citing the lack of normal conditions for surfing the forum. I'm not going to argue here.But using the Chrome browser and various extensions is again not a good move.I'll put it simply: start with mobile devices, but aim to buy a laptop or computer. In comparison, after driving a BMW, you no longer want to ride a donkey wagon.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on December 24, 2022, 11:17:39 AMI'll put it simply: start with mobile devices, but aim to buy a laptop or computer. In comparison, after driving a BMW, you no longer want to ride a donkey wagon.Some forum users have Laptops and Personal computers, but still prefer to use their mobile devices after trying out to use their Laptops/Computers. IMO, I think it is all a matter of preference. Some persons are more comfortable using their mobile device for forum activities and other things, and they are very effective with it, while others like myself do better with a laptop or a personal computer. There is no hard rule about the device you must use in the forum, If you are effective using any of the devices options, the forum permits it, so long as your contributions are on point, helpful and effective.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Even though nowadays almost everything can be accessed via mobile, the convenience of access will still be different when you use a PC or laptop. even those who usually access via a PC with a monitor size that is large enough will also be a little annoyed when forced to use a laptop which is of course visually different.I'm a PC user to access forums. access via mobile phone only when getting notifications from telegram. just checking. when I want to reply also I will wait till I am in front of the PC. the main reason is convenience.

comments.author: aylabadia05
comments.body: I only conveyed the message that there is no term to complain about all the limitations because there are still many roads that will be found if we want to try. It is true that working with Personal Computers and Laptops is much more effective from typing to other things that are very helpful when we work.However, if these devices are not available due to limited ability to buy, then using mobile devices such as Android can also be helped to activate ourselves here.Maybe those of us who have the best suggestions can also be conveyed so that it can help those who feel limited to activities in the crypto space.
